${ModID}:IceBeam.NAME: Ice Beam
${ModID}:IceBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this deals unblocked damage, apply !M! starlight:Chill.

${ModID}:SlushBall.NAME: Slush Ball
${ModID}:SlushBall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! starlight:Wet. NL Apply !M! starlight:Chill.

${ModID}:Reflection.NAME: Reflection
${ModID}:Reflection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

${ModID}:FreezeDry.NAME: Freeze-Dry
${ModID}:FreezeDry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals double damage to starlight:Wet enemies.

${ModID}:IcyWind.NAME: Icy Wind
${ModID}:IcyWind.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! starlight:Chill and Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Hail.NAME: Hail
${ModID}:Hail.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block and deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Mist.NAME: Mist
${ModID}:Mist.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Blizzard.NAME: Blizzard
${ModID}:Blizzard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! starlight:Chill to ALL enemies X times. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Frostburn.NAME: Frostburn
${ModID}:Frostburn.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply starlight:Chill, apply {!M!|1=an equal amount of|@=!M! times that much} starlight:Burn.{@@}
